short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically displays prerequisite information for UBC Grades courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly be able to see prerequisites while viewing course grades from UBCGrades.com. 

Press the "Toggle Prerequisite Info" button on the bottom left of the window to see information including course prerequisites, corequisites, and the course description.
